attributes.action: Remove Matt Hancock and Boris Johnson from Parliament by the right of revolution
attributes.additional_details: Remove Matt Hancock and Boris Johnson from Parliament by the right of revolution (or right of rebellion) is the right or duty of the people of a nation to overthrow a government that acts against their common interests and/or threatens the safety of the people.
attributes.background: Stop the use of masks stop the social distancing and allow people to live life for the sake of humanity and mental health

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions which call for a named individual to be given a job, or to lose the one they currently have, as petitions cannot override someone's right to due process.
